title: Beef and Brocoli
desc: A super simple beef and brocoli dish
directions: Create the sauce: Peel & dice the garlic and mix with all the soy sauce
Slice the beef then marinade the beef in 3/4 of the sauce
Cut the brocoli into bite-sized pieces and steam them for 5-7 minutes
Saute all the beef for 5 minutes, then add in the steamed brocoli
Stir the pan evenly, and turn off the heat after 5 more minutes
Dish is finished. Pour the remaining sauce over the dish and enjoy
